Tattoos

lead_paragraph: A federal judge in Columbus, Ohio, handed down a three-year sentence to the tattoo parlor owner whose purchase of Ohio State football memorabilia led to an ongoing N.C.A.A. investigation.
snippet: A federal judge in Columbus, Ohio, handed down a three-year sentence to the tattoo parlor owner whose purchase of Ohio State football memorabilia led to an ongoing N.C.A.A. investigation.
